div.p: What is the best book you've ever read and why?

The best book I've ever read is "Because I love you" of Musso who is one of the best writter up to me. His litterature is not the same as Voltaire or any of these big writters but I really like the fact that everybody can read what he does.

The book that I am talking about is a book which anybody can read. The story is a miggle of love story and drama. The way he is writting gives the story something so special that you don't even want the book to finish.
